title: I hate you Gentleman Gnar
body:
Gentleman Cho
Grages Esq.
Archduke Nasus
Superb Villain Veigar
Mad Hatter Shaco

I thought this series was finished already.
And if there is a skin that will be about luxurious gentlemen, they must be expensive and rich!! Not 975! :(

replies.body: Are you seriously saying that riot should make something cost more... Wow.

I dont understand? Gentleman cho is the only other gentleman skin, all the others are not of those same theme. Archduke nasus is in costume for a party, Mad hatter Shaco is firstly Mad, and secondly, a Hatter (someone who makes hats), neither of which are very 'luxurious' Superb villain veigar is a bit more high society, but the purple outfit and gauntlet denote wealth and extravagance but not 'Class' he may certainly be aristocracy but not as refined as a gentleman, Gragas Esq is the same, the suit shows wealth and social standing but lacks the 'class' of gentlemen, not to mention that RIOT fits it into the mafia theme over the gentleman one, hence when they had their mafia skin sale, gragas Esq was included and named the 'boss'

Also regarding your pricing:

Superb villan Veigar: 975

Gragas Esq: 975

Mad Hatter Shaco: 520

Archduke Nasus: 750

Gentleman Cho: 1820

Gentleman Gnar: 975

many of the skins you mentioned are lower than 975 so why does Gnar get the disappointment? also not to mention that G Gnar is a higher quality skin than G Cho, despite the price difference, cho has a voice over but thats the only thing it has over the gnar skin, its messy and apart from blatant add ons like the pipe just stuck on his claw, the skin retains its normal colouration unlike gnar, 

also the gentleman theme seems to be for creating irony for already 'Uncivilised' champs.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=A2aRkInr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-15T06:40:31.099+0000)
>
> I dont understand? Gentleman cho is the only other gentleman skin, all the others are not of those same theme. Archduke nasus is in costume for a party, Mad hatter Shaco is firstly Mad, and secondly, a Hatter (someone who makes hats), neither of which are very 'luxurious' Superb villain veigar is a bit more high society, but the purple outfit and gauntlet denote wealth and extravagance but not 'Class' he may certainly be aristocracy but not as refined as a gentleman, Gragas Esq is the same, the suit shows wealth and social standing but lacks the 'class' of gentlemen, not to mention that RIOT fits it into the mafia theme over the gentleman one, hence when they had their mafia skin sale, gragas Esq was included and named the 'boss'
> 
> Also regarding your pricing:
> 
> Superb villan Veigar: 975
> 
> Gragas Esq: 975
> 
> Mad Hatter Shaco: 520
> 
> Archduke Nasus: 750
> 
> Gentleman Cho: 1820
> 
> Gentleman Gnar: 975
> 
> many of the skins you mentioned are lower than 975 so why does Gnar get the disappointment? also not to mention that G Gnar is a higher quality skin than G Cho, despite the price difference, cho has a voice over but thats the only thing it has over the gnar skin, its messy and apart from blatant add ons like the pipe just stuck on his claw, the skin retains its normal colouration unlike gnar, 
> 
> also the gentleman theme seems to be for creating irony for already 'Uncivilised' champs.

gragas esquire is part of the same set of skins that gentleman cho and gnar are from.
where did you find that out? the fact that they released their 'mafia' bundle with him as the boss to me was a dead give-away that he wasn't, also he doesn't fit the theme visually.

"cho has a voice over but thats the only thing it has over the gnar skin"

Please wash your mouth out, "Do you want some more cheese with your wine" has to be THE best voice-over in league.
Like i said, cho's voiceover is the only thing it has better than gnar..
Gentleman Gnar must have the voiceover and the price to qualify as a gentleman!

And Grag esq, superb veigar, mad hatter shaco and archduke nasus do?

why are those non voiceover, non pricey, non actually called gentleman skins more gentlemanly than gnar?
Gentleman gnar is probs the most worth 975 Rp skin, I've have not stop playing gnar because of It... HES SO FRICKEN ADORABLE!!!
